channel.title: MineCraftier.net - Dedicated Community
channel.description:
Website: MineCraftier.net An active medium server: Always at least 20 people online! 50+ Players during peak! & Growing! [youtube]http://youtu.be/bCukJtZZpwU[/youtube]
[b]CONNECT TO: IP: HUB.MINECRAFTIER.NET[/b]
Creative World | Auto-Ranks | Factions | Chestshop | MCMMO | Plotme Big worlds to explore, we rely on users knowing Residence & LWC to protect their own stuff. Fun server to play on, users progress through ranks based upon an active user timer. This server is ideal for people familiar with Bukkit plugins to get the most out of the server. Gain levels and abilities, create and sell a home on the market. PvP is disabled on the main world, enabled on Factions world and users are allowed to grief on PvP worlds. Website uses Enjin
[img]http://cdn.minecraft-server-list.com/serverlogo/41344.jpg[/img]
[u]But Wait!!![/u]
[b]MORE SERVERS![/b] Main Server: hub.minecraftier.net ChaosScape: s1.chaosscape.com Tekkit Server: tekkit.minecraftier.net Hunger Games: hgames.minecraftier.net
